//Ragnus//

  Ragnus twisted and turned as he moved towards the firing bot, 
enabling him to dodge most of the shots. A few hit causing some minor 
cosmetic damage, but one hit him in the wing joint. Forcing him to 
transform into his robot mode.  Luckly he had gotten to a close 
enough range before the shot hit.

  Jumping into the air towards Shivah, he unsheaths one of his energy 
sword and extends a railgun.  As he begins to come down, he lets 
loose a spray of shots and prepares his sword for a slashing attack 
when he lands.


> Shivah::
> 
> Shivah noticed the attack and he typed some buttons  and took off. 
> The BlackFortress went to the botton of the lava lake while Shivah 
> transformed to his robot mode and  fired 25 times agaisnt Ragnus
